availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Himes (Lewis County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier (U.S.A.))

body.p: Lewis County, Kentucky farmer and private. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Himes. Father of Richard Himes, Andrew Himes, Mary L. Himes, George E. Himes, and Jeremiah Himes. Farmer in Lewis County, Kentucky, in 1860. Served in 16th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as private from March 21, 1864, to August 6, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, p. 811.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), 9th Congressional District, KY, September 1863, p. 154 (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Special Schedules of the Eleventh Census (1890) Enumerating Union Veterans and Widows of Union Veterans of the Civil War, Series M123, Record Group 15 (accessed via ancestry.com).
